name: My Father Belicoso (Davidoff NYC Excl.)
additionalNotes:
Puros blended outside the classic "Pepin." Modeled after the Bolivar Belicoso Fino, at 5.5" x 52. Cabs of 50 & singles. Tremendous creaminess while still maintaining their rich Nicaraguan character and body.
